videos.title: The Secrets of the Cell | The Creation Podcast: Episode 29
videos.description:
Cells are the basic units of life, and in some forms they are actually organisms. What is a cell? What goes on inside of a cell? Did all life come from a single cell?
 
Join host Ivana Semidey and ICR geneticist Dr. Jeff Tomkins as they explore the unique design and complexities of the cell in episode 29 of The Creation Podcast.

Related resource: The Design and Complexity of the Cell | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/dr-jeff-tomkins-the-design-and-complexity-of-the-c.html

#Science #Podcast #Biology #Cells #Bible #TheCreationPodcast #Life #ICR

videos.title: Are We Really Full of Junk DNA? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 30
videos.description:
Is it really true that less than 2% of genes are functional? Is the other 98% just "junk?" 
 
In episode 30  of The Creation Podcast, host Lauren Pennington and ICR geneticist Dr. Jeff Tomkins debunk misconceptions about the usefulness of genes. This episode will reveal some surprising facts about RNA production, regulatory functions of genes, and more!

Related resource: Guide to the Human Body | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/guide-to-the-human-body.html

videos.title: Living on the International Space Station | Creation.Live Podcast: Episode 5
videos.description:
Most of us have never been to space, but we wonder what it's like. What does it take to become a NASA astronaut? What do astronauts do while in space? 

Sit with us as Colonel Jeff Williams recounts stories from his time in space and how his experiences have deepened his faith. Hosts Trey, Ivana, and ICR physicist Dr. Jake Hebert also ask him about life on other planets, flat earth, and multiverse theories in this episode of Creation.Live.

videos.title: Do We Have Useless Organs? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 31
videos.description:
Tonsils, the appendix, and the spleen are just a few examples of organs within the human body that many people refer to as "useless," but are they?
 
The Creation Podcast host Trey Bowling sits down with ICR president Dr. Randy Guliuzza to determine whether or not these organs serve a purpose. Listen as Dr. Guliuzza—a medical doctor—explains how these organs function and point to a purposeful Designer.

Related resources: Clearly Seen | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/dr-randy-guliuzza-clearly-seen.html

Useless Organs: The Rise and Fall of a Central Claim of Evolution | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/useless-organs-the-rise-and-fall-of-a-central-clai.html

videos.title: Seeing Stars At Impossible Distances | The Creation Podcast: Episode 32
videos.description:
For millennia, mankind has looked at the stars in wonder. Technology has allowed us to study these magnificent creations, but we still have questions. A prominent issue is the distant starlight problem. Given the age of our planet, how are we able to see stars at such mind-bending distances?
 
Listen in as host Trey Bowling and ICR physicist Dr. Jake Hebert discuss the matter. The answer may not be as cut and dry as you think!

Related resources: The Universe: A Journey Through God's Grand Design | Get the DVD set here: https://store.icr.org/the-universe-a-journey-through-gods-grand-design.html

#Science #Podcast #Physics #BigBang #Astronomy #Stars #Bible #TheCreationPodcast #ICR #Universe #Creation #Space 

Note: At 2:09, Dr. Hebert states the unit of measurement of the speed of light incorrectly. It should be miles per second, not miles per hour.

videos.title: Amazing Animals, Obvious Design | Creation.Live Podcast: Episode 6
videos.description:
From the pets in our backyard to the creatures that dwell deep within the ocean, the world is home to a fascinating variety of animals. Where did they come from? Why do they seem so perfectly designed to fill their roles?

Join us as Dr. Jobe Martin shares his personal story about the evolution of a creationist and how particularly unique creatures challenged his beliefs about the world. Hosts Trey and Ivana learn about a number of intriguing animals from Dr. Martin and ICR zoologist Dr. Frank Sherwin in this episode of Creation.Live.

videos.title: These Animals Are Masters of Disguise | The Creation Podcast: Episode 33
videos.description:
From the leopard's spots to the butterfly's wings, many of our planet's creatures possess the ability to hide in plain sight. Where did this skill come from? And why is it found in so many diverse places?

videos.title: Hear the Entire New Testament Recited from Memory! | The Great Recital: Day 1 | ICR Discovery Center
videos.description:
Professor Tom Meyer and friends perform dramatic readings of the entire New Testament from memory during The Great Recital at the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, TX.

The Bible contains many references to being read aloud at public gatherings—such as the Feast of Tabernacles on the Sabbatical year, which included a celebratory reading of God’s Word (Deuteronomy 31:11-13). This ritual intended to produce a life of obedience and ensure a continuation of the nation’s divine prosperity.

By attending this event in person or online, you are part of an ancient historical tradition that spans thousands of years.

---

The Great Recital: Day 1 | Mr. Scott Firebaugh and Mr. Aaron House | The Gospels of Mathew and Mark

---

Technology has information at our fingertips. But our relationship with God needs to be one of the heart, not the smartphone. Get engaged with the Word of God in a refreshing and amazing new way! Memorize verses, chapters, and even whole books of the New Testament using the “Bible Memory Man” Prof. Tom Meyer’s powerful techniques that he learned while studying in Jerusalem, Israel. Having memorized 20 complete books of the Bible, Tom shares his helpful tips. Go deeper into Scripture and command a greater knowledge, insight, and understanding of God!

Purchase The Memorization Study Bible here: https://store.icr.org/the-memorization-study-bible.html

---

Looking for a resource that explains the Old Testament? Check out Tom Meyer's Proverbs Commentary here: https://store.icr.org/proverbs-a-verse-by-verse-guide.html

---

videos.title: Do Complex Systems Defy Evolution? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 34
videos.description:
Which came first, the protein or the cell? They were intentionally created at the same time along with every essential component of the all-or-nothing systems of life on earth. However, the theory of evolution claims that all forms of life arose by chance over long periods of time – is that possible?

Join host Trey Bowling and ICR paleobiochemist Dr. Brian Thomas as they define irreducible complexity, describe systems that qualify as all-or-nothing, and discuss how these biological necessities prove to be incompatible with evolutionary theory.

Related resource: Creation Basics & Beyond, 2nd Ed. | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/creation-basics-beyond-2nd.html

#Science #Podcast #Evolution #Creation #TheCell #Biology #Genesis #Bible #TheCreationPodcast #ICR #AllorNothing #IrreducibleComplexity

videos.title: How Old Is The Universe? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 35
videos.description:
Many scientists claim that the universe is approximately 13.8 billion years old by reverse-engineering the Big Bang with the assumption that this theory is correct. How then do they explain the signs of youth in the earth, our solar system, and deep space? 

In this episode, host Ivana Semidey and ICR physicist Dr. Jake Hebert take a look at how phenomena like the earth's magnetic field, comets, distant starlight, spiral galaxies, and globular clusters provide evidence for a universe that is closer to 6,000 years old. 

Related resource: Guide to the Universe | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/guide-to-the-universe.html

videos.title: The Importance of Biblical Creation Seminar | Chas Morse | November 5, 2022
videos.description:
Join us as the ICR Discovery Center hosts The Importance of Biblical Creation Seminar on Saturday, November 5! ICR Director of Donor Relations Chas Morse will answer seven questions about Genesis, biblical creation, and implications for your faith. Share this live stream with your family and friends for a faith-building, edifying creation event. 

---

Preaching and teaching the biblical narrative of six-day creation and the worldwide Flood as real history is an essential doctrine of Scripture with practical present-day implications for believers in Christ.

The four primary educational goals for this series of lectures are as follows:

• An increased confidence in the clarity and accuracy of God’s Word especially as it pertains to Biblical Creation
• Discover the importance of embracing a Biblical Creation worldview as it relates to the entirety of Scripture
• Demonstrate how a true understanding of current scientific research affirms a historical and correct interpretation of Scripture
• Acknowledge the implications for believers so that they will embrace living Biblically in this present age (Foundational text: 2 Peter 3:1-18)

---

Introduction: Does Genesis Matter?
In this introductory session, Mr. Morse gives an overview of the importance of believing in a literal six-day creation and worldwide Flood as conveyed in Genesis. He defines biblical creation and then begins to explain how rejecting the creation account leads to other problems in properly understanding God’s written Word.

What Does the Bible Say About Biblical Creation?
The Bible clearly tells us how God created the universe and this is clearly taught throughout the pages of Scripture. Mr. Morse underscores the Bible's insistence that the world was made in 6 literal days and that the world was engulfed by a worldwide Flood—a theme emphasized both in the Old and New Testaments.

What Does Theology Say About Biblical Creation?
Believing in Biblical Creation is foundational in the gospel message and in other theological themes presented in Scripture. Mr. Morse unfolds several of these themes in this brief session.

How Does History Weigh Creation’s Importance?
Mr. Morse will briefly discuss how the how church viewed creation and the Genesis Flood before, during, and after the Reformation? Also, we will see how the Reformation’s focus on the clarity of Scripture shifted the church back to viewing creation and Flood as historical events.

How Is Creation Viewed in the Church Today?
Why are many pastors and Christian leaders today deferring to ideologies like evolution and natural selection rather than believing in the historical events of Genesis? Mr. Morse will discuss several reasons why we have seen this compromising shift.

Does Good Science Have Any Relationship to the Biblical Narrative?
Are there conflicts between science and the Bible? Is there a relationship between what science is observing in creation and what’s recorded in Scripture? Mr. Morse will show how true scientific discoveries affirm the works of God as they are recorded in Scripture.

What Are the Creation Implications for a Believer’s Sanctification?
Believing in a literal 6-day creation and a worldwide Flood makes a difference in one’s Christian growth as discussed in 2 Peter 3:1-18. Mr. Morse will be discussing our understanding of a Biblical Creationist worldview and its place in a believer’s sanctification.

---

videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 14, 2023, for the Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, Texas! The human body is an amazing feat of biological engineering, with myriad interconnecting systems that produce unique capabilities.

ICR’s Made in His Image Seminar examines the human body in all its wonder—created by God fully functional, fully human, and fully in His image. Each presentation reinforces the knowledge that every person is special to God, created with unique physical abilities, intellect, and spiritual life to fulfill His purpose.

---

• 10:15 AM | Dr. Brian Thomas | Adam, or Apes?

Polls show that illustrations of ape-like human ancestors convince more Americans of evolution than any other subject. Dr. Thomas shows how to place ape-man candidate fossils into three Genesis-friendly categories.

---

• 11:15 AM | Dr. Jeff Tomkins | Jesus Loves the Little Children: Explaining Red, Yellow, Black, and White

Where do all the people groups come from and are there really different human races? This talk debunks the evolutionary idea of human races started by Charles Darwin and shows how modern genetics and the Bible prove that human diversity connects directly to the Biblical accounts of the creation of man, the global flood, and the confusion of languages and dispersal at the Tower of Babel.

---

• 1:15 PM | Dr. Brian Thomas | Certainly Human: How Reproduction Reveals Creation

Details of human reproduction clearly show how mankind must have come from God, not primates. Middle school and older listeners will gain a new appreciation for the Creator’s genius and find new confidence that God alone designed marriage and human life.

videos.description: Watch the whole episode here: https://youtu.be/kz0GVdNu8Sg

videos.title: Darwin Dethroned Seminar (2023)
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on February 11, 2023, for the Darwin Dethroned Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, Texas!

Evolutionists mark the birth of Charles Darwin every February, as they venerate a man whose life’s work was pivotal in establishing naturalistic thinking as the predominant worldview in Western Civilization. Countless people have been influenced by the publication of his most notable work “The Origin of the Species,” and have accepted some form of Darwinian evolution as uncontested fact. But, how much has been discovered in the 160+ years since Darwin, that unravels his ideas and worldview, and unseats him as a legitimate authority on how creatures originate and adapt?

ICR’s Darwin Dethroned Seminar examines the claims of Darwin, and modern Darwinists, who argue that the diversity of life forms came about from random, purposeless processes, over millions of years, and that creatures have adapted to their environments by means of a mysterious force deemed Natural Selection.

Scripture and the scientific evidence are clear: the Lord Jesus Christ purposefully engineered all things by His Word, and pre-programmed creatures to interact with and fill their environments through a complex system of innate sensors, logic mechanisms, and output responses in a way that far exceeds anything Darwin could've ever imagined.

---

• 10:15 AM | Dr. Brian Thomas | The Beginning of Life

Using information you won’t find in secular biology textbooks, Dr. Thomas demonstrates the complete failure of natural processes to explain how life began. He critiques evolutionary speculations about the beginning of life and illustrates the engineered precision in cellular machines to show that God—not nature—created life.

---

• 11:15 AM | Dr. Tim Clarey | Geology and Deep Time

In this presentation, Dr. Clarey shows how sedimentary evidence across several continents confirms the occurrence of a global Flood. He presents oil industry data compiled into maps and diagrams that illustrate the progression of the Flood and match the biblical narrative. He provides biblically based scientific explanations for large-scale sedimentary deposits that were rapidly formed by catastrophic activity. This abundant evidence supports a worldwide Flood that happened just thousands of years ago.

---

• 1:15 PM | Dr. Randy Guliuzza | It’s Time to Do Biology as if Darwin Had Never Been Born 

This presentation will introduce you to a groundbreaking new model called continuous environmental tracking (CET) that explains how organisms adapt. It is the first fully organism-focused, design-based explanation of adaptation to be developed by any organization. Christians should know that the latest scientific research is fully on the side of a design-based explanation of adaptation…and evolutionists are trying to force-fit it into their theory. Some Intelligent Design advocates and creationists still see organisms as having been designed in part by a Designer and in part by nature, but there’s no scientific reason for this. CET brings clarity and eliminates the mysticism inherent in all selection-based notions. Properly identify the true cause of organisms’ dramatic capacity to self-adjust to different environments and you are on your way to the most powerful argument for a beneficent intelligent Designer consistent with the God of the Bible.

---

Evolutionary scientists say that our planet is billions of years old and many people accept their words as truth. But can we trust the science behind their claims? How do we separate the good science from the bad?

ICR zoologist Dr. Frank Sherwin and ICR paleobiochemist discuss this topic with a student during a live Q&A on a college campus.
 
#CreationQA #Science #History

---

videos.title: Established Day 4 | Creation.Live Podcast: Episode 13
videos.description:
Humans have long been fascinated by the night sky. As Psalm 19:1 reminds us, "The heavens declare the glory of God"—His creative signature can be seen across our universe. What are some specific ways outer space points to our Creator, Jesus Christ? How can you learn more about astronomy? What is the Day4 Astronomy ministry, and how can you get involved?

Hosts Trey and Lauren delve into the cosmos with Parker Eng of Day4 Astronomy, as well as ICR's Dr. Jake Hebert.

videos.description:

ICR zoologist Dr. Frank Sherwin discusses this topic with a student during a live Q&A on a college campus.
 
#CreationQA #Science #History

videos.title: Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis - Trailer
videos.description:
Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis presents evidence that confirms the biblical account of creation and offers defensible answers to some of the most provocative and controversial questions of faith and science. How did life begin? Where did humans come from? Was Noah’s Flood real? How old is the earth?

In each dynamic 22-minute episode, host Markus Lloyd guides the viewer on a memorable journey through some of the most fascinating topics in creation science. Through interviews with the leading creation scientists, insights from cutting-edge research, and on-location investigations, Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis presents evidence that supports a biblical viewpoint and dispels pervasive and inaccurate theories from the secular world.

Developed by the Institute for Creation Research, one of the world’s leading creation research organizations, this outstanding series provides an engaging exploration of creation science like never before. Together with the 112-page viewer guide, Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis is an excellent resource for church, home, or academic study. Christians of all ages can find many of the answers they need to affirm and defend their faith and to discover the harmony between Scripture and science.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/unlocking-the-mysteries-of-genesis-dvd-series.html

videos.title: Made in His Image - Trailer
videos.description:
"So God created man in His own image; in the image of God He created him; male and female He created them." Genesis 1:27

Produced from a biblical perspective, Made in His Image will inspire audiences by looking at the human body in all its wonder—fully functional, fully human, and fully created in God's image. Featuring medical, engineering, and other experts like Dr. Randy Guliuzza, Made in His Image will fascinate audiences with mind-blowing facts, dazzling imagery, and memorable illustrations.

The four episodes will examine the stages of human development and show that everything we need to fulfill God's plan is instilled in us from the first moments of life. Each episode reinforces the knowledge that every human is special to God, and that he has endowed each of us with unique physical abilities, intellect, and spiritual lives to fulfill His purpose.

videos.title: Uncovering the Truth About Dinosaurs - Trailer
videos.description:
Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs explores the most fascinating and mysterious creatures of all time - dinosaurs.

Fueled as much by popular culture as by science, dinosaurs capture the imagination. Footprints and fossilized bones prove they once existed, but many questions linger about what they were, where they came from, and how they lived and died. From the Institute for Creation Research, Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs takes on the challenge of unraveling these mysteries and unearthing the real truth.

Host Markus Lloyd (Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis and Made in His Image) journeys to various locations to investigate some of the common theories about dinosaurs, while experts in subjects like paleontology, geology, archaeology, and history examine evidence that casts doubt on secular theories about geologic time and evolution.

Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs offers compelling evidence about these mysterious creatures that confirms the biblical account of Genesis. Witness the awesome work of the Creator and see how the Bible gets it right in all matters -- including dinosaurs.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/uncovering-the-truth-about-dinosaurs-dvd-series.html

videos.title: The Universe: A Journey Through God's Grand Design - Trailer
videos.description:
Humans have always been intrigued by the celestial objects beyond our world and wondered: What are they? Where did they come from? And what do they say about where we come from?

The Universe: A Journey Through God’s Grand Design takes viewers on a journey through time and space, exploring how some of the greatest discoveries in astronomy were made by scientists of faith seeking to understand the exquisite order of God’s universe.

Host Markus Lloyd (Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis, Made in His Image, and Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs) travels to world-class observatories and other locations, guiding viewers through the history of astronomy. From early theories of the solar system to Newton’s laws to the space race, every century yields profound discoveries and new mysteries to explore.

Each episode takes us deeper into space and closer to today, when interplanetary probes reveal astonishing evidence that confirms and leaves us in awe of God’s grace and power.

O Lord, our Lord,
How excellent is Your name in all the earth,
Who have set Your glory above the heavens!

Out of the mouth of babes and nursing infants
You have ordained strength,
Because of Your enemies,
That You may silence the enemy and the avenger.

When I consider Your heavens, the work of Your fingers,
The moon and the stars, which You have ordained,
What is man that You are mindful of him,
And the son of man that You visit him?
For You have made him a little lower than the angels,
And You have crowned him with glory and honor.

You have made him to have dominion over the works of Your hands;
You have put all things under his feet,
All sheep and oxen—
Even the beasts of the field,
The birds of the air,
And the fish of the sea
That pass through the paths of the seas.

O Lord, our Lord,
How excellent is Your name in all the earth!

Psalm 8:1-9

videos.title: Made in His Image Seminar (2024)
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 20, 2024, to celebrate the sanctity of human life during ICR's annual Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center. 

This event will feature ICR president Dr. Randy Guliuzza, who will be educating us on our innate value as human beings, and Dallas-based ministries that will show us how we can support the preservation of the sanctity of human life.

Note: Presentations may contain some sensitive subject matter.

* All livestream times are Central Standard Time.

---

• 10:35 AM | Dr. Randy Guliuzza (ICR) | The Image of God: Why It Matters

The “image of God” was brought into existence during the creation week and was uniquely infused into mankind. You will learn what the image of God is and why only human beings bear this precious gift. This image gives humans a special status in creation and has real day-to-day implications. It’s the most important factor in how people should treat each other and other creatures across the whole spectrum of life.


• 11:25 AM | Ms. Amy Ford (Embrace Grace) | Best Gift Ever

Ms. Ford, the founder of Embrace Grace, will be speaking about how this organization equips single and pregnant mothers in all 50 states and the world with Hope.


• 1:00 PM | Ms. Leanne Jamieson (Prestonwood Pregnancy Center) | Pregnancy Center Ministry in a Post-Roe World

Ms. Jamieson will talk about the ministry to abortion-determined women in a Post-Roe world. Abortion is illegal in the state of Texas, but we are far from it being unthinkable or unattainable. How are Believers called to action, and what does the changing landscape of ministry look like, given the victories had at the Supreme Court level? Ms. Jamieson will also discuss the abortion pill and abortion pill reversal and include powerful stories of life.


• 1:40 PM | Q&A Session

---

Made in His Image, ICR's breathtaking series, explores evidence that the complex design of the human body is the result of God's purposeful creation. videos.title: Uncovering the Truth About Dinosaurs 1: Digging into Dinosaurs
videos.description:
The full series is available to members of the Champion of Creation tier!

Interviews with experts reveal intriguing information about favorite dinosaurs like T. rex and Triceratops, while host Markus Lloyd explores a fossil dig where paleontologists work to unravel the mysteries hidden in dinosaur bones.

Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs explores the most fascinating and mysterious creatures of all time—dinosaurs. We know they existed because we've discovered their footprints and fossilized bones. But the facts of their existence—and their extinction—remain shrouded in mystery. What were the dinosaurs? When and where did they live? How and when did they die? And why does it matter to Christians? The answers to these mysteries are buried in Earth's layers and revealed in the pages of the Bible. Studying evidence from paleontology, geology, biology, archaeology, and history, we'll get to the bottom of the story and unearth the real truth about dinosaurs.

videos.title: Unearthing a Duckbilled Dinosaur? | Dinosaur Week at the ICR Discovery Center | March 12, 2024
videos.description:
Dinosaurs have fascinated us for centuries. Some scientists claim that these creatures lived long before humans, millions of years in the past. But such assertions oppose the historical account of Scripture. Which is true? Find out during Dinosaur Week 2024 at the ICR Discovery Center—March 12–16!

—

Tuesday, March 12

• 10:30 AM | “Raising Ruth, Unearthing a Duckbilled Dinosaur in the Hell Creek Formation” by Tommy Lohman of Glendive Dinosaur & Fossil Museum

Have you ever wanted to get a glimpse into the work of excavating a dinosaur skeleton? How do they excavate those delicate bones? Come and hear Field Paleontologist Tommy Lohman (Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum, Montana) explain the excavation process and provide relevant insights into the Genesis flood and how it affirms history as recorded in the Bible.

• 1:00 PM | "Discovering Dinosaurs" by Dr. Brian Thomas of ICR

Dr. Thomas presents five details about dinosaurs that reframe the biggest dinosaur questions, including how dinosaurs got here and where they went.

* All livestream times are Central Daylight Time.

—

Join us for more dinosaur fun this week—livestream links below:

Wednesday, March 13—Do Dinosaurs Support Evolution? https://www.youtube.com/live/7MwW39gxR3Q?si=utbDhA5TWzQLR3XO 

Thursday, March 14—Are Dinosaurs in the Bible? https://www.youtube.com/live/hmENGhq3aEI?si=XC1t2ojI4WV0twhO

videos.title: Do Dinosaurs Support Evolution? | Dinosaur Week at the ICR Discovery Center | March 13, 2024
videos.description:
Dinosaurs have fascinated us for centuries. Some scientists claim that these creatures lived long before humans, millions of years in the past. But such assertions oppose the historical account of Scripture. Which is true? Find out during Dinosaur Week 2024 at the ICR Discovery Center—March 12–16!

—

Wednesday, March 13

• 10:30 AM | “Beholding Behemoth, the Bible, and Science Behind the Chief of Dinosaurs” by Tommy Lohman of Glendive Dinosaur & Fossil Museum

Are dinosaurs mentioned in the Bible? The book of Job talks about an animal called 'Behemoth,' described as the 'chief of the ways of God.' Join us and learn from Field Paleontologist Tommy Lohman about how Behemoth is a dinosaur and how the details of Job 40 help us understand dinosaur biomechanics.

• 1:00 PM | "Do Dinosaurs Support Evolution?" by Dr. Tim Clarey of ICR

Dr. Clarey talks about the fossil record of dinosaurs, showing they appeared suddenly and without ancestors. He also explains how dinosaurs and birds are not alike, and how dinosaurs did not have feathers. Finally, he addresses the asteroid extinction story and counters with a Biblical explanation of the disappearance of dinosaurs.

* All livestream times are Central Daylight Time.

—

videos.title: Homo Naledi: The Lies Behind Evolution's Rising Star
videos.description:
Homo naledi, once evolution's 'rising star,' was considered to be a prime example of human evolution. But is it really proof? Or is this discovery just another dishonest attempt to garner fame, funding, and fortune?

Host Trey and Dr. Jeff Tomkins discuss this vital topic on episode 69 of The Creation Podcast!

Articles:

Homo naledi: Another Failed Evolutionary Ape-Man - https://www.icr.org/article/homo-naledi-another-failed-evolutionary-ape-man/

Homo naledi Didn't Behave Like Humans - https://www.icr.org/article/14425/

No scientific evidence that Homo naledi buried their dead and produced rock art - https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0047248423001434

videos.title: When Day Meets Night: Solar Eclipse Totality at the ICR Discovery Center
videos.description:
The skies cleared above North Texas on Monday, April 8, for a spectacular view of the 2024 Great American Solar Eclipse. Hundreds of guests joined the Institute for Creation Research to witness this incredible sight at First Baptist Church Forney and the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, with several others from around the world viewing via ICR’s YouTube livestream. While totality only lasted about four minutes, the day was filled with celebration alongside ICR scientists, Apollo 16 astronaut Gen. Charlie Duke and his wife, Dotty, NASA astronaut Col. Jeff Williams, former NASA engineer Cathryn Sterling, and several astronomy enthusiasts.

Read the full story here: https://www.icr.org/article/when-day-meets-night-total-success

Totality image and video credit: Parker Eng, Day4 Astronomy, https://day4.org/

videos.title: Ernst Haeckel: Evolutionary Huckster
videos.description:
Ernst Haeckel, a German Zoologist, is famous for developing a series of images of embryos in development called Anthropogenie. These images, supposedly proof of evolution, dominated culture and textbooks for some time.

But Haeckel was wrong, and the damage he caused has never quite been undone. What happened?

Host Trey and Dr. Randy Guliuzza discuss this vital topic on episode 71 of The Creation Podcast!

Twenty Evolutionary Blunders:
https://store.icr.org/dr-randy-guliuzza-twenty-evolutionary-blunders.html

videos.title: ICR Dinosaur Dig Experience in Glendive, Montana!
videos.description:
Do you dream of unearthing a bone from a Triceratops? A hadrosaur? A T. rex? Have you ever wondered what it feels like to hold a freshly dug dinosaur fossil in your hands, or to see other animals buried along with dinosaurs, providing evidence for the global flood? Now is your time to make this dream a reality!

We are excited to announce our first ever Dinosaur Dig Experience! This year, we will be digging in the fossil-rich landscapes of Glendive, Montana. We invite you to roll up your sleeves with us, grab a digging tool, and uncover the mysterious creatures that lie within the sediment layers of this barren land.

This dino dig isn’t just about digging. It’s about learning, exploring, and examining the evidence that demonstrates a catastrophic global flood. You’ll have the unique opportunity to learn from ICR Research Scientist Dr. Brian Thomas, Field Paleontologist Mr. Tommy Lohman, and Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum Director Mr. Robert Canen. Who knows what you will discover!

No experience? No problem! Whether you’re a seasoned fossil hunter or a curious first-timer, our experienced team will guide you every step of the way. Tools, safety equipment, and training will be provided.

Visit https://www.icr.org/dinodig to learn more.

We will also have presentations from Mr. Bruce Malone of Search for the Truth, educating us on how to defend the truth of biblical creation, and from Dr. Brian Thomas of ICR who will be speaking on how we can view this commemoration in light of the Gospel.

Along with our educational presentations, there will be a petting zoo, food trucks, fun activities, games and discounted tickets for everyone!

videos.title: Dinosaurs with Bird Brains???
videos.description:
Editor's Note - at 13:09 we show footage of a T. rex, instead of a Deinonychus. We do have an animatronic Deinonychus as well. Pardon the error.

Evolutionists claim that birds are descended from dinosaurs. A feature that is often cited as linking these two types of creatures is the brain. But are the brains of dinosaurs and birds really that similar?

Host Trey and Dr. Tim Clarey discuss this vital topic on episode 74 of The Creation Podcast!

Jurassic World C.L Episode: https://youtu.be/b89DXIJCnCk
Did Dinosaurs Have Feathers?: https://youtu.be/Errj81-hY0Q

videos.description:
This video will be made available to the public on July 2, 2024.

From 1941 to 1945, Nazi Germany and its allies systematically murdered approximately six million Jews in a genocide known as the Holocaust. This was, at the time, around two-thirds of Europe’s Jewish population. Alongside the Jews, others who had been deemed ‘inferior’ suffered during the Nazi’s reign. This included the Roma, the Polish, people of Slavic descent, black people, the mentally ill, and the disabled. But why? To what end? In this three-part series, we’re going to look at the roots of the Holocaust from a scientific perspective as well as uncover the Darwinian undercurrent that allowed it all to take place.

Join Trey and ICR President, Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this vital topic on Episode 76 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Darwin vs. Mendel: A Battle of Worldviews
videos.description:
This video will be made public on August 13, 2024.

Living things, whether animal or plant, exhibit a variety of traits that can change from generation to generation. These trait variations can help them adapt to thrive in certain situations. Some of these adaptations happen quite quickly as creatures pioneer new niches, developing traits that allow them to fit their environmental conditions. But how does this happen?

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 79 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Living for a Millennium?!
videos.description:
This video will be made public on August 27, 2024.

Scripture describes humans living for a very long time, nearly a millennium before the Flood. Many scoff at this, stating that this is reason to disregard the Bible. Even some evangelicals claim these ages just can’t be taken literally. But, is that really true? Are such long lifespans scientifically possible? And is there historical or scientific evidence to corroborate the Bible’s claims that ancient humans experienced extreme longevity?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 80 of The Creation Podcast.

Worldwide Traditions of Primordial Paradise
https://www.icr.org/article/worldwide-traditions-primordial-paradise

Monumental Monsters
https://store.icr.org/untold-secrets-of-planet-earth-monumental-monsters.html

Allometric and Metabolic Scaling
https://digitalcommons.cedarville.edu/icc_proceedings/vol9/iss1/18/

Crassostrea Oyster Fossils Show Evidence of Extreme Longevity
https://www.creationresearch.org/crassostrea-oyster-fossils-show-evidence-of-extreme-longevity

videos.title: Giants, Genetics, and Pre-Flood Longevity
videos.description:
This video will be made public on September 10, 2024.

Scripture describes humans living for a very long time, nearly a millennium before the Flood. Many scoff at this, stating this is reason to disregard the Bible. Even some evangelicals claim these ages just can’t be taken literally. But, is that really true?

In the last episode, we looked at historical and scientific evidence to corroborate the Bible’s claim that the Genesis patriarchs lived to extremely old ages. In fact, this longevity was probably experienced by at least some animals, as well. In this podcast, we ask the question, Might it eventually be possible for biblical creationists to actually explain this extreme longevity?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 81 of The Creation Podcast.

Do Tiny Mammal Fossils Corroborate Pre-Flood Longevity?

videos.title: Biblical Archaeology Conference 2024
videos.description:
The Bible has been God’s Word to His people for millennia, but most people today question whether the events it records are actual history. Every time the Bible’s claims can be tested, however, they stand up to scrutiny. Join us on Friday, November 10th, and Saturday, November 11th, as we explore the archaeological evidence for the historicity of the Bible!

The Biblical Archaeology Conference will feature renowned Biblical Scholar and Archaeologist, Dr. Randall Price of World of the Bible, and Prof. Tom Meyer, author of Archaeology and the Bible, and a graduate of Jerusalem University College.

videos.title: Living in Light of Genesis
videos.description:
This video will be made public on September 24, 2024.

The world tells us that the book of Genesis is, if not entirely, at least partially a myth. We are told that history, archaeology, and science contradict supernatural creation and that there were no Adam and Eve in a Garden of Eden, so their sin didn’t bring death into the world.

But does the evidence support the truth of the Bible’s opening book? Could it be that Genesis is vitally important to how we understand our world, our lives, and the God who made us? Does it provide the foundation we need for all aspects of faith, science, and culture?

Dr. Thomas, author of Living in Light of Genesis, learned to accept the Bible’s history as literally truth not in spite of historical scientific knowledge, but in light of that knowledge.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 82 of The Creation Podcast.

Purchase Living in Light of Genesis here: https://store.icr.org/living-in-light-of-genesis.html

Racism and its foul fruits have plagued humanity for thousands of years and in the past couple of centuries it seems to have only reared its ugly head all the more. videos.title: These Ph.D. Scientists Believe the Bible!
videos.description:
Dr. Brian Thomas interviews Dr. Stephen Taylor and his wife, Ann, to explore how their deep-rooted faith and advanced scientific research intersect. Dr. Taylor, a mass spectrometry expert, shares his journey from skepticism to belief in biblical creation, revealing how his technical research—spanning dinosaurs, dating methods, and paleobiochemistry—strengthened his conviction in the Bible’s reliability. Together, they discuss reconciling science and Scripture, showing how scientific evidence harmonizes with biblical truth. This insightful conversation will encourage you to consider a fresh perspective on origins, purpose, and faith. Discover how cutting-edge science supports a biblical worldview in this engaging interview!

videos.title: The Undeniable Power of Narrative
videos.description:
This video will be made public on November 5, 2024.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 85 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: A Theory Designed to Be...Anti-Design
videos.description:
This video will be made public on November 19, 2024.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

In the previous episode, we looked at the purpose and power of theory. Now we’ll look at how evolutionary selectionism, the current reigning theory, is purposefully crafted to be anti-design, and therefore remove any sort of Designer from the equation.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 86 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Megasequences of the Great Flood Trailer | Creation Class
videos.description:
Earth's sedimentary rocks are made of six layers—or megasequences—laid one on top of the other in the same pattern all over the world. Many geologists claim these layers were laid down slowly over vast spans of time, but where is the evidence? What do the rocks actually show? Join ICR geologist Dr. Timothy Clarey as he digs through the rock record and explores Earth's megasequences to uncover the truth.

Can science and faith be reconciled? What should we believe about the Bible's account of human origins and Earth history? ICR's Creation Class series affirms the accuracy and reliability of Scripture.

Join ICR experts as they teach how science—from genetics to geology—confirms the truth of God's Word.

Champions of Creation can watch here: https://youtu.be/tdvus1iFRPs

videos.title: From the Beginning to the End
videos.description:
Genesis and Revelation provide stunning bookends of the biblical canon. The first describes the beginning of creation while the second gives us insight into future eternity. Both are vital pieces of Scripture and yet, without fail, they are two of the most highly questioned books of the Bible. Are these accounts true? Can they be trusted? What purpose do they have in the Christian's life?

Hosts Trey and Michael are joined by Col. Tim Moore and Dr. Randy Guliuzza to discuss this topic in episode 31 of Creation.Live.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. Learn what these celestial bodies reveal about our Creator and study the work of astronomers and astronauts who explored the skies before us.

Conduct hands-on experiments, observe the night sky, and follow in the footsteps of great scientists as you earn your Foundations of Astronomy patch. Get ready for a journey beyond our world—this mission is going to be a blast!

A science-focused, gospel-driven program for K-6th graders. Through hands-on challenges, experiments, and digital learning tools, kids explore scientific principles through a biblical worldview.

videos.title: 3 Game-Changing Benefits of a Theory of Biological Design
videos.description:
This video will be made public on December 17, 2024.

Dr. Guliuzza's articles on this topic:
Why Biology Needs a Theory of Biological Design
Part 1 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological
Part 2 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-2
Part 3 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-3
Part 4 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-4

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

In the previous episodes, we looked at the purpose and power of theory; how evolutionary selectionism, the current reigning theory, is purposefully crafted to be anti-design; and how to reverse Darwin’s thought processes to develop a theory of biological design that actually works. In this episode, we’ll look at how the benefits of a theory of biological design as well as a general overview of what it means to look at organisms with such a perspective.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 88 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Made In His Image Seminar 2025
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 18, 2025, to celebrate the sanctity of human life during ICR's annual Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center. https://www.youtube.com/live/9Yv4m9FYy2I?si=9XEQXl8j6MvoL4b6

What determines the value of human life? How do we measure its worth, and what steps can we take to protect and cherish it? These profound questions are at the heart of ongoing debates in today’s culture, where ideas about the meaning and value of life are often challenged. To find true and lasting answers, we must look to the Creator of life, the ultimate source of purpose and design, for a correct understanding of what it means to be human and why life is sacred.

ICR president Dr. Randy Guliuzza will delve into the extraordinary design behind human life, highlighting the intricate complexity and purpose that reflect the work of an intelligent Creator. His insights will offer a fresh perspective on why human life is not only unique but also precious beyond measure. Additionally, Mr. Jay Seegert, founder of The Starting Point Project, will equip attendees with practical tools to defend the value of life in a culture often at odds with its sacredness. His dynamic presentation will empower individuals to confidently articulate the reasons why every human life is worth protecting and honoring.

This seminar will be an enlightening experience, combining science, faith, and apologetics to deepen our appreciation for the Creator's handiwork and strengthen our ability to advocate for the sanctity of life in our communities and beyond. Join us for this inspiring event and take part in celebrating the wonder and value of human life.

videos.title: America's Oldest National Park - Exploring the Unique Features of Yellowstone
videos.description:
This video will be made public on January 14, 2025.

Carved in Stone - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone.html
Carved in Stone (DVD) - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone-dvd.html
Creation on Location - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD8MDfIU9MHBbi_x1f1stCAa
Parks Across America - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america.html
Parks Across America Map - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-map.html
Bundle - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-pack.html

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through the Parks Across America.

In this first episode of the series, we’re going to take a look at some of the features of America’s oldest national park—Yellowstone.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 89 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Towers, Buttes, and Gardens of Stone - Exploring America's National Monuments
videos.description:
This video will be made public on January 28, 2025.

Carved in Stone - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone.html

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through the Parks Across America.

In this second episode of the series, we’re going to take a look at several national monuments throughout the United States.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 90 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: The Great Ape Debate: Bad Science Gone Bananas? | Creation Connection Ep. 1
videos.description:
The chimpanzee: our distant relative or just a funky neighbor? Humans and chimps are often compared, with claims of a 98-99% DNA match. But is this legitimate science or a case of cherry-picked data?

Join us for episode one of Creation Connection as we dive into what genetics really say about chimps, humans, and our origins. Evolutionists have their theories, but do they hold up under scrutiny? Spoiler alert: the truth might surprise you.

With insights from geneticist Dr. Jeff Tomkins and a closer look at what the Bible says, we’ll untangle the facts, bust myths, and maybe even settle the ultimate question. Where did humans come from?

Settle back, grab some takeout (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

videos.title: Earth: A Cosmic Coincidence or Perfect Design? | Creation Connection Ep. 2
videos.description:
Earth races around the sun at 67,000 miles per hour, yet it remains the only known planet to support life. Why does our world have the perfect conditions for oceans, seasons, and breathable air, while thousands of others remain barren and lifeless? Is this just a cosmic fluke, or is there something special about our home?

Join us for episode two of Creation Connection as we explore why Earth’s position in the ‘Goldilocks Zone’ makes it the ultimate home—neither scorched nor frozen, but perfectly suited for life. From its precise orbit to the stabilizing role of the moon and protective atmosphere, everything about our planet appears fine-tuned for our survival. Could it really be an accident, or is it the work of a masterful Creator?

With insights from physicist Dr. Jake Hebert and a closer look at what the Bible says, we’ll uncover the science behind our planet’s perfect placement and what it reveals about its origins. When you examine the details, Earth seems less like a lucky break and more like a work of genius.

Pour yourself a bowl of porridge (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through Parks Across America.

In the first couple of episodes of this series, we explored America’s oldest national park—Yellowstone—as well as several prominent national monuments. Today, we’ll be visiting two other national parks, both of which show signs of catastrophic flood activity.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 91 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Exploring the Deep: Ocean Oddities That Defy Evolution | Creation Connection Ep. 3
videos.description:
The ocean covers over 70% of our planet, yet more than 90% of its depths remain unexplored. And lurking beneath the waves? Some of the strangest, most fascinating creatures you’ll ever see! But are these bizarre marine invertebrates the product of random evolution, or do they showcase masterful design?

Join us for episode three of Creation Connection as we dive into the incredible world of jellyfish, octopuses, nautiluses, and other spineless wonders. With their mind-blowing abilities—like built-in jet propulsion, invisibility cloaks, and even stolen stinging cells—these creatures seem anything but accidental.

Biologist Dr. Frank Sherwin joins us as we take a closer look at what the Bible says and uncover the truth behind these underwater wonders. We’ll explore the ocean’s oddest animals and what they reveal about their origins. Could these deep-sea creatures really be the result of chance, or do they point to a brilliant Creator?

Strap on your snorkel (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Foundations of Botany Trailer | Kids on Mission
videos.description:
Discover the beauty and design of Kingdom Plantae in this new Foundations of Botany course. Learn about plant types, classification, and the cellular processes that help them thrive. Explore ecology, mutualism, and how weather and seasons impact plant growth. Get hands-on by starting your own garden and learning plant care and propagation.

Botany is deeply rooted in Scripture. We’ll examine what plants teach us about creation, ourselves, and our Savior (Isaiah 40:8).

What is Kids on Mission?
A science-focused, gospel-driven program for K-6th graders. Through hands-on challenges, experiments, and digital learning tools, kids explore scientific principles through a biblical worldview.

Why join?

- Learn science through engaging challenges
- Earn mission patches for completed challenges
- Strengthen your faith and share the truth of God’s creation

Start your journey today. Learn more and register here: https://www.icr.org/kids-on-mission

videos.title: Dragon Encounters: Exploring Myths, Legends, and Real History | Creation Connection Ep. 4
videos.description:
Dragons have captivated human imagination for millennia. From the mighty Bahamut of Middle Eastern lore to the fearsome Tiamat of Babylonian myth, these legendary beasts span continents and cultures. But could there be more to these stories than mere fantasy?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we journey through history’s dragon tales—from the ancient Chinese Zodiac to the pages of the Book of Job. We’ll explore Roman accounts from Alexander the Great’s campaign and uncover Marco Polo’s chilling reports of monstrous serpents in the East.

Dr. Brian Thomas joins us to examine the mysterious behemoth described in Scripture—could it be a dinosaur? And if ancient cultures worldwide spoke of dragon-like creatures, could they have encountered real animals we now call dinosaurs?

Grab your sword and shield (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Grand Tetons and Great Sand Dunes – Remnants of a Global Flood
videos.description:
This video will be made public on February 25, 2025.

Carved in Stone - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone.html
Carved in Stone (DVD) - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone-dvd.html
Creation on Location - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD8MDfIU9MHBbi_x1f1stCAa
Parks Across America - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america.html
Parks Across America Map - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-map.html
Bundle - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-pack.html
Megasequences of the Great Flood - https://store.icr.org/megasequences-of-the-great-flood.html

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through Parks Across America.

In the first few episodes of this series, we explored America’s oldest national park – Yellowstone, as well as several other national parks and monuments. Today we’ll be visiting two other stunning locations that showcase catastrophic geology.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 92 of The Creation Podcast.

Other episodes in this series:
America's Oldest National Park - Exploring the Unique Features of Yellowstone - https://youtu.be/_HG_DdEvme0
Towers, Buttes, and Gardens of Stone - Exploring America's National Monuments - https://youtu.be/84ru2qqNaKM
Hot Springs & Badlands – Folded Rock, Fossil Graveyard, and a Global Flood? - https://youtu.be/CEFOP6TBLoY

videos.title: Darwin's Dilemma: The Flaws of Natural Selection | Creation Connection Ep. 5
videos.description:
When Charles Darwin introduced natural selection, it became the foundation of modern evolutionary theory. But does it truly explain the complexity of life—or is it just a convenient replacement for divine design?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we dive deep into the idea of natural selection, exploring its scientific weaknesses, the language used to describe it, and why even some evolutionary scientists are questioning its validity. Is nature really an agent of change, or is there a better explanation for the way creatures adapt?

Join us as we explore Continuous Environmental Tracking (CET)—a groundbreaking model that aligns with both science and Scripture, showing how creatures are designed to adapt from within.

Featuring insights from experts, thought-provoking evidence, and a fresh look at Darwin’s own words, this episode challenges the conventional narrative on evolution.

Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell so you never miss an episode!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: The Cambrian Explosion: Evolution’s Other “Big Bang” Problem | Creation Connection Ep. 6
videos.description:
Fossils offer a fascinating glimpse into Earth’s past—but what if they tell a different story than what we’ve been taught? Evolutionists claim that the fossil record reveals a slow progression from simple to complex life. But one of the earliest layers, the Cambrian, presents a major problem: a sudden explosion of fully-formed, complex creatures with no clear evolutionary ancestors.

In this episode of Creation Connection, we dive into the mystery of the Cambrian Explosion. Why do we see clams, trilobites, and starfish appearing all at once in the fossil record? Where are the transitional forms Darwin himself admitted were missing? And why do so many Cambrian creatures still look the same today?

Dr. Timothy Clarey joins us as we explore how the Cambrian Explosion challenges the core tenets of evolution and how the global flood provides a better explanation for the evidence.

Learn why evolutionists have been struggling with this problem for over a century, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Cold Hard Facts: Ice Cores and the Collapse of Old Earth Creationism
videos.description:
This video will be made public on March 11, 2025.

Welcome to the first episode in a series called “The Failures of Old Earth Creationism.” Many Christians attempt to fit old earth ideology into their beliefs, adopting uniformitarian or evolutionary pieces into their worldview. While this is often done in an effort to appeal to science, it often leads to major issues logically, scientifically, and theologically.

Today we’ll look at what is considered by many to be a strong argument for an old Earth: ice cores. Ice cores, cylindrical cores drilled from the thick ice sheets, are often presented as indisputable evidence of hundreds of thousands, or even millions, of years of Earth’s history, but how reliable are these claims? What assumptions lie beneath the surface of these interpretations? In this episode, we’ll discuss: what ice cores are and why they’re significant, the assumptions and flaws in Old Earth interpretations, and how ice cores ultimately align with a young Earth model.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 93 of The Creation Podcast.

The debate mentioned in this podcast: https://www.youtube.com/live/ciQLb_ei4_0?si=1GnhN6jbkRG8Ypjc

The Ice Age and Climate Change: https://store.icr.org/the-ice-age-and-climate-change.html

videos.title: The ICR Dino Dig Experience 2025
videos.description:
icr.org/dinodig

Do you dream of unearthing a bone from a Triceratops? A hadrosaur? A T. rex? Have you ever wondered what it feels like to hold a freshly dug dinosaur fossil in your hands, or to see other animals buried along with dinosaurs, providing evidence for the global flood? Now is your time to make this dream a reality!

We are excited to announce our second Dinosaur Dig Experience! This year, we will be digging in the fossil-rich landscapes of Glendive, Montana. We invite you to roll up your sleeves with us, grab a digging tool, and uncover the mysterious creatures that lie within the sediment layers of this barren land.

This dino dig isn’t just about digging. It’s about learning, exploring, and examining the evidence that demonstrates a catastrophic global flood. You’ll have the unique opportunity to learn from ICR's Director of Research Dr. Tim Clarey, Field Paleontologist Mr. Tommy Lohman, and Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum Director Mr. Robert Canen. Who knows what you will discover!

No experience? No problem! Whether you’re a seasoned fossil hunter or a curious first-timer, our experienced team will guide you every step of the way. Tools, safety equipment, and training will be provided.

videos.title: The Ice Age: Serious Science or Slippery Slope? | Creation Connection Ep. 7
videos.description:
The Ice Age—fact, fiction, or just really cold speculation? We’ve all seen the images: mammoths, saber-toothed cats, and glaciers covering massive parts of the earth. But how much do we really know about the Ice Age, and does the popular narrative hold up under scrutiny?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we take a cold plunge into the science behind Ice Age theories, from the widely accepted Milankovitch cycles to an alternative model grounded in the biblical record. Uniformitarian scientists propose multiple Ice Ages stretching over millions of years, but does the evidence actually support that claim? Or is there a better explanation—one that fits within a young earth framework?

Join us as we break the ice on this fascinating topic with insights from physicist Dr. Jake Hebert, who presents the H.E.A.T. model—a biblically consistent explanation of the Ice Age following the Genesis Flood. We’ll explore what caused the Ice Age, how long it lasted, and what it means for our understanding of earth’s history.

Grab your best winter coat, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell for more episodes of Creation Connection!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

The Ice Age and Climate Change: https://store.icr.org/the-ice-age-and-climate-change.html

videos.title: Dinosaur Soft Tissue: Fossil Evidence That Challenges Deep Time | Creation Connection Ep. 8
videos.description:
For decades, scientists assumed that dinosaur fossils were millions of years old, with all organic material long gone. But then—an accident changed everything. Dr. Mary Schweitzer’s groundbreaking discovery of soft tissue inside a T. rex bone sent shockwaves through the scientific community. Red blood cells? Collagen? Flexible material? These things shouldn’t exist if dinosaurs died out 65+ million years ago… right?

So how did this soft tissue survive? Are mainstream scientists ignoring the evidence? And what does this mean for evolutionary theory?

Some scientists scrambled for explanations, but none of them hold up under scrutiny. Could this be evidence that dinosaurs lived much more recently than we’ve been told? And does this discovery fit better with a biblical timeline?

Dr. Brian Thomas joins us as we explore how soft tissues found in fossils challenge mainstream thinking and what it really means for the age of dinosaurs (and other fossil creatures.)

Learn why this is such a big deal, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: The Soulless Hominid Theory: A Fatal Flaw in Old Earth Creationism
videos.description:
This video will be made public on March 25, 2025.

Welcome to the second episode in a series called “The Failures of Old Earth Creationism.” Many Christians attempt to fit old earth ideology into their beliefs, adopting uniformitarian or evolutionary pieces into their worldview. While this is often done in an effort to appeal to science, it can cause major logical, scientific, and theological issues.

The conversation surrounding human origins has always been an intriguing one. One of the most debated subjects is the nature of the beings labeled ‘hominids,’ particularly Neanderthals. Biblical Creationists firmly place Neanderthals in the ‘human’ category—descendants of Adam and Eve, thus bearing God’s image. Most evolutionary biologists today also agree with Neanderthals being mostly human, leaving their genetic mark on our DNA through interbreeding.

Some old earth creationists suggest something quite different. They claim that Neanderthals were nothing more than animals—truly bipedal animals that are able to make and use tools, paint, and bury their dead—but animals nonetheless.

Is there any truth to this idea? Were they just animals? Or were they fully human, bearing the image of God? In today’s episode, we’ll dig into “The Mystery of the Soulless Hominids,” exploring the faulty beliefs that lead some down this path, and uncovering what science and Scripture say about the matter.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 94 of The Creation Podcast.

Adam or Apes: https://store.icr.org/adam-or-apes.html

Contested Bones: https://store.icr.org/dr-john-sanford-contested-bones.html

videos.title: The Stunning Complexity of the Human Body | Creation Connection Ep. 9
videos.description:
Your body is a masterpiece of engineering—37.2 trillion cells working in perfect harmony to allow you to think, move, create, and experience the world. From running marathons to sculpting masterpieces, the human body is capable of incredible feats. But could something this intricate really be the product of blind evolutionary processes?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we take a deep dive into the systems that keep you alive, exploring the precise interdependence of your body’s design. Evolutionists claim that humans evolved piece by piece over millions of years, but does the evidence actually support that? Or does the complexity of the human body point to something greater—something designed?

We’ll also tackle the claim that the human eye is "badly designed" and expose the flaws in that argument. Plus, we’ll explore the amazing structure of the human hand and why scientists struggle to replicate its abilities.

Join us as we examine the evidence, challenge evolutionary assumptions, and uncover the truth about what makes us truly human.

Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell for more episodes!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: From Ash to Evidence: Mount St. Helens and Rapid Geologic Change | Creation Connection Ep. 10
videos.description:
On May 18, 1980, Mount St. Helens erupted with a force that shocked scientists. It was the most studied volcanic eruption in history, and what researchers discovered challenges long-held assumptions about Earth's history.

Join us for this episode of Creation Connection as we explore how this modern catastrophe reshaped our understanding of geology, rock layers, radiometric dating, and even the recovery of ecosystems. Could this eruption provide a small-scale model for the massive destruction and renewal caused by Noah’s Flood?

We'll look at:
How canyons formed in hours, not millions of years
How radiometric dating gave wildly inaccurate ages for new rock
How the landscape recovered far faster than expected

With insights from Dr. Tim Clarey, we’ll show how Mount St. Helens serves as a real-world example of catastrophic processes that reshape the Earth—no deep time required.

Stay fired up, don’t blow your top, and make sure to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqDl

videos.title: Cracks in the Layers: Lake Suigetsu and the Old Earth Illusion
videos.description:
This video will be made public on April 8, 2025.

Welcome to the third episode in a series called “The Failures of Old Earth Creationism.” Many Christians attempt to fit old earth ideology into their beliefs, adopting uniformitarian or evolutionary pieces into their worldview. While this is often done in an effort to appeal to science, it can cause major logical, scientific, and theological issues.

Lake Suigetsu is a large lake located near the coast of the Sea of Japan with a depth of about 34 meters at its center. Old Earth Creationists claim that the sediments from this lakebed absolutely show that the Earth is at least 50 thousand years old. What evidence are these scientists looking at that supposedly provide ironclad proof that the Young Earth Creationist model is wrong?

In today’s episode we’ll explore the evidence in an effort to uncover “The Truth About Lake Suigetsu,” dismantling the poor science that causes many well-meaning individuals down a path that only leads to error.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 95 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Fossil Hoaxes: Missing Links or Missing the Point? | Creation Connection Ep. 11
videos.description:
Ever since Darwin dropped On the Origin of Species, scientists have been obsessed with the idea of transitional fossils—those elusive "in-between" creatures that supposedly bridge the evolutionary gaps. From dino-birds to ape-men, the fossil record is full of candidates… or is it?

In this eye-opening episode of Creation Connection, you'll embark on a wild ride through some of the most famous (and infamous) fossil finds that were once hailed as evolutionary slam dunks—until they weren’t.

From the savage stereotypes of Neanderthal Man, to the jaw-dropping (and jaw-faked) Piltdown hoax, to National Geographic’s feathered fiasco, and a lemur who got way too much press—this episode uncovers how imagination, ideology, and a dash of desperation can lead even experts down the wrong path.

With commentary from Dr. Brian Thomas and a close look at what Scripture actually says, we pull back the curtain on the myth of transitional fossils and reveal why the truth is often far simpler—and far more Biblical—than the mainstream wants you to believe.

Settle in, grab a snack, and make sure to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqDl
